wisp.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a wisp of hair, grass, hay etc is a thin piece of it that is separate from the rest
wisp.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: A wisp of hair had escaped from under her hat.
wisp.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a wisp of smoke, cloud, mist etc is a small thin line of it that rises upwards
wisp.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Wisps of smoke rose into the air.
